Class FunctionSum

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.psl.reasoner.function.FunctionSum

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NegativeLogFunction

    public class FunctionSum
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<FunctionSummand>, FunctionTerm
    A numeric function defined as a sum of FunctionSummands.
